operations.summary: Get the geo-location for an IP address or a hostname
operations.notes:
The following optional query parameters can be supplied: type, ip
The response format depends on the input type parameter: xml or json
Request URI sample: /ipservice/geolocation?ip=redhat.com&type=json
Corresponding JSON response:
{
"ip": "209.132.183.105",
"country_code": "US",
"country_name": "United States",
"region_code": "NC", "region_name": "North Carolina",
"city": "Raleigh",
"zip_code": "27601",
"time_zone": "America/New_York",
"latitude": 35.7716,
"longitude": -78.6356,
"metro_code": 560
}

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Expected response format: xml or json - default: json

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: IP address or hostname - default: empty
